flawed_nl_solution:
Three fewer trumpets than Miles has fingers is 10-3=<<10-3=7>>7 trumpets.
Two more guitars than he has hands is 2+2=<<2+2=8>>8 guitars.
Two more trombones than he has heads is 2+1=<<2+1=3>>3 trombones.
And one fewer French horn than he has guitars is 8-1=<<8-1=7>>7 French horns.
Altogether, Miles owns 7+8+3+7=<<7+8+3+7=25>>25 musical instruments.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 8. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
